metadata.title: CVE-2023-2181 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before15.9.8, 15.10.0 before 15.10.7, and 15.11.0 before 15.11.3. A maliciousdeveloper could use a git feature called refs/replace to smuggle contentinto a merge request which would not be visible during review in the UI.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
